importantArticles.headline: NGPL PipeCo LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (the "Company"), has announced that it has commenced solicitations of consents (each, a "Consent Solicitation") from holders ("Holders") of the Company's 4.875% Senior Notes due 2027 (the "2027 Notes") and 3.250% Senior Notes due 2031 (the "2031 Notes" and, together with the 2027 Notes, the "Notes" and each a "Series of Notes") to certain amendments (the "Proposed Amendments") to the Indenture, dated as of August 1, 2017, relating to the 2027
